Instance.description: Various tuning used by the CAS client.

TunableTuple.name: ContextMenu
TunableTuple.description: Parameters for Context Menu in CAS.

Tunable.name: CatalogPanelWidth
Tunable.description: Width of the catalog panel, should also include width of the menu icons. Defines max menu radius.

Tunable.name: DefaultRegionMinRadius
Tunable.description: Min radius used for tops and bottoms.

Tunable.name: DefaultRegionMult
Tunable.description: Specifies top/bottom menu radius in the units of sim head on-screen size.

Tunable.name: DefaultRegionRadius
Tunable.description: Default radius used for tops and bottoms.

Tunable.name: DefaultRegionXLocation
Tunable.description: Fallback x-location of top/bottom context menu.

Tunable.name: HeadRegionMinRadius
Tunable.description: Min radius used for tops and bottoms.

Tunable.name: HeadRegionMult
Tunable.description: Specifies head menu radius in the units of sim head on-screen size.

Tunable.name: HeadRegionRadius
Tunable.description: Menu radius used for head region.

Tunable.name: HeadRegionXLocation
Tunable.description: Fallback x-location of head context menu.

Tunable.name: MenuRadiusIncrement
Tunable.description: Difference between radii of the main menu and sub-menu.

Tunable.name: DebugDataDependency
Tunable.description: Used for dev purposes to gracefully transition code/data dependencies. Set to 1 along with dependent data changes. Reset it back to 0 after transition

Tunable.name: AnimatedHighlightFrameDuration
Tunable.description: Time (in seconds) for which each individual highlight texture is shown during animation.

Tunable.name: AnimatedHighlightFrameInterval
Tunable.description: Time (in seconds) between highlight textures during animation.

Tunable.name: AnimatedHighlightStartDelay
Tunable.description: Time (in seconds) before an animation starts (for the regions that require a delay).

Tunable.name: EaseInExponent
Tunable.description: Ease In from Direct Manip. Ease In less than 1, Linear is 1, Ease Out is greater than 1

TunableTuple.name: ManipLimitHighlightColor
TunableTuple.description: Color of the highlight displayed as the user gets close to the direct manipulation limit. Values must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: Red value

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: Green value

Tunable.name: z
Tunable.description: Blue value

Tunable.name: ManipLimitHighlightScale
Tunable.description: Scale value that controls the intensity of the highlight displayed as the user gets close to the direct manipulation limit.

Tunable.name: MinCameraDistanceContextMenu
Tunable.description: Distance at the context menu will stay open.

Tunable.name: MinCameraDistanceHead
Tunable.description: Distance at which individual head controls become active.

TunableTuple.name: PieWedgeStartAngles
TunableTuple.description: Parameters defining the start angle of each pie wedge.

Tunable.name: Back
Tunable.description: Start angle of the Back pie wedge.

Tunable.name: Front
Tunable.description: Start angle of the Front pie wedge.

Tunable.name: ProfileLeft
Tunable.description: Start angle of the ProfileLeft pie wedge.

Tunable.name: ProfileRight
Tunable.description: Start angle of the ProfileRight pie wedge.

Tunable.name: ThreeQuarterLeft
Tunable.description: Start angle of the ThreeQuarterLeft pie wedge.

Tunable.name: ThreeQuarterRight
Tunable.description: Start angle of the ThreeQuarterRight pie wedge.

Tunable.name: RubberBandEaseElasticity
Tunable.description: Rubber band elasticity value determines how loose or tight the rubber band is. A value greater than 0 will cause the rubber band to stretch, and the higher that value the more stretchy. A value less than 0 will cause the rubber band to contract and a higher value will cause it to contract faster. Use in conjunction with the rubber band zone to adjust the speed/feel of the rubber band movement.

Tunable.name: RubberBandZoneSize
Tunable.description: Rubber band zone for direct manip mouse cursor -- this is the outer limit that the mouse cursor can be pulled before there is resistance against the user's movement.

Tunable.name: VirtualSliderScaleHorizontal
Tunable.description: Horizontal Slider scale for direct manip mouse movement in pixel/screen units. Smaller value is more 1:1 movement, higher value is slower.

Tunable.name: VirtualSliderScaleVertical
Tunable.description: Vertical Slider scale for direct manip mouse movement in pixel/screen units. Smaller value is more 1:1 movement, higher value is slower.

Tunable.name: VisualizationScaleFactor
Tunable.description: A scale factor applied to the virtual slider length and width to grow it smaller/bigger for on-screen UI

Tunable.name: TryOnReplaysProbability
Tunable.description: Probability (in percents) of replaying try-on animation after it was played once.

TunableEnum.name: CASSimCustomizationOptionType
TunableEnum.description: The tab this option belongs to in CAS.

Tunable.name: OptionName
Tunable.description: The name of the option as it will appear in the UI

Tunable.name: Tooltip
Tunable.description: Optional tooltip to describe the purpose of this field.

Tunable.name: FemaleDefault
Tunable.description: True if the selected trait option is the default value for female sims

Tunable.name: MaleDefault
Tunable.description: True if the selected trait option is the default value for male sims

Tunable.name: UnselectedFemaleDefault
Tunable.description: True if the unselected trait option is the default value for female sims

Tunable.name: UnselectedMaleDefault
Tunable.description: True if the unselected trait option is the default value for male sims

TunableList.name: UnselectedValueTraitList
TunableList.description: Traits that will be applied if this option is unselected. Required for checkboxes.

Tunable.name: ValueName
Tunable.description: localized display name of option value

TunableList.name: ValueTraitList
TunableList.description: Traits that will be applied if this option is selected. Default for radio buttons. Add deselected for checkboxes.

Tunable.name: GenderOptionsTitle
Tunable.description: The name of the gender options group

TunableTuple.name: GeneticInheritance
TunableTuple.description: Parameters for changing Genetic Inheritance in CAS.

Tunable.name: HeterochromiaChanceNoParents
Tunable.description: Chance of offspring having heterochromia if no parents have it.

Tunable.name: HeterochromiaChanceOneParent
Tunable.description: Chance of offspring having heterochromia if one parent has it.

Tunable.name: InheritCustomPaintChance
Tunable.description: Chance of inheriting the parent's custom paint texture separate from its base layers.

Tunable.name: InheritCustomPaintFromOtherParentChance
Tunable.description: Chance of inheriting the custom paint texture from the parent that's NOT contributing the base layers.

Tunable.name: InheritIdenticalPeltChance
Tunable.description: Chance of inheriting the parent's exact pelt (including custom paint layer), versus getting another breed-appropriate preset.

TunableEnum.name: MixedBreedTag
TunableEnum.description: Tag used to indicate a non-purebred pet.

Tunable.name: SiblingChance
Tunable.description: Chance of inheriting features when generating a sim from a sibling.

Tunable.name: SingleParentChance
Tunable.description: Chance of inheriting features between single parents and their offspring.

TunableTuple.name: Physique
TunableTuple.description: Parameters for Changing Physique in CAS.

Tunable.name: EaseInExponentBony
Tunable.description: Controls the rate at which the bony texture fades in with the bony value. Less than 1: ease-in; Equal to 1: linear; Greater than 1: ease-out.

Tunable.name: EaseInExponentFit
Tunable.description: Controls the rate at which the fit texture fades in with the fit value. Less than 1: ease-in; Equal to 1: linear; Greater than 1: ease-out.

Tunable.name: EaseInExponentHeavy
Tunable.description: Controls the rate at which the heavy texture fades in with the heavy value. Less than 1: ease-in; Equal to 1: linear; Greater than 1: ease-out.

Tunable.name: EaseInExponentLean
Tunable.description: Controls the rate at which the lean texture fades in with the lean value. Less than 1: ease-in; Equal to 1: linear; Greater than 1: ease-out.

Tunable.name: FitTextureFadeOutEnd
Tunable.description: When the fit value reaches this threshold in the CAS room, the lean texture on the Sim finishes fading out (i.e. disappears completely). This value must be greater than FitTextureFadeOutStart.

Tunable.name: FitTextureFadeOutStart
Tunable.description: When the fit value reaches this threshold in the CAS room, the lean texture on the Sim starts fading out. This value must be smaller than FitTextureFadeOutEnd.

Tunable.name: HeavyTextureFadeOutEnd
Tunable.description: When the heavy value reaches this threshold in the CAS room, the fit or bony texture on the Sim finishes fading out (i.e. disappears completely). This value must be greater than HeavyTextureFadeOutStart.

Tunable.name: HeavyTextureFadeOutStart
Tunable.description: When the heavy value reaches this threshold in the CAS room, the fit or bony texture on the Sim starts fading out. This value must be smaller than HeavyTextureFadeOutEnd.

Tunable.name: MaxBony
Tunable.description: Maximum bony value that can be set in CAS (0 to 1).

Tunable.name: MaxFit
Tunable.description: Maximum fit value that can be set in CAS (0 to 1).

Tunable.name: MaxHeavy
Tunable.description: Maximum heavy value that can be set in CAS (0 to 1).

Tunable.name: MaxLean
Tunable.description: Maximum lean value that can be set in CAS (0 to 1.)

TunableTuple.name: PresetRotation
TunableTuple.description: Parameters for setting the Sim's rotation in the CAS room.

Tunable.name: LerpSpeedMult
Tunable.description: Preset rotation lerp speed.

Tunable.name: RotateContinuousEaseIn
Tunable.description: Initial ease in speed increments for continuous rotate.

Tunable.name: RotateContinuousSpeed
Tunable.description: Rotation speed for continuous rotate via press-hold.

Tunable.name: RotateKeySpeed
Tunable.description: Rotation speed by key input.

Tunable.name: RotateKeySpeedFast
Tunable.description: Fast rotation speed by key input.

TunableTuple.name: ViewAngles
TunableTuple.description: The preset rotation angles for each pie wedge.

Tunable.name: Back
Tunable.description: Back preset rotation angle.

Tunable.name: Front
Tunable.description: Front preset rotation angle.

Tunable.name: ProfileLeft
Tunable.description: ProfileLeft preset rotation angle.

Tunable.name: ProfileRight
Tunable.description: ProfileRight preset rotation angle.

Tunable.name: ThreeQuarterLeft
Tunable.description: ThreeQuarterLeft preset rotation angle.

Tunable.name: ThreeQuarterRight
Tunable.description: ThreeQuarterRight preset rotation angle.

TunableTuple.name: Randomization
TunableTuple.description: Parameters for changing specific randomization probabilities in CAS.

Tunable.name: AccessoriesChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly adding Accessories to a Sim at all when randomizing.

Tunable.name: AccessoryBraceletChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining a bracelet when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessoryEarRingsChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining ear rings when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessoryGlassesChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining glasses when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessoryGlovesChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining gloves when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessoryNecklaceChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining a necklace when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessoryRingsChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining rings when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: AccessorySocksChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining socks when randomizing if a random accessory should be set.

Tunable.name: FullbodyOutfitChanceFemale
Tunable.description: Chance of obtaining a fullbody outfit when randomizing a female sim.

Tunable.name: FullbodyOutfitChanceMale
Tunable.description: Chance of obtaining a fullbody outfit when randomizing a male sim.

Tunable.name: GhostPartChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining a ghost part when randomizing.

Tunable.name: HatChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly adding a Hat to a Sim when randomizing.

Tunable.name: HeterochromiaChance
Tunable.description: Chance of heterochromia appearing on pets.

TunableList.name: HeterochromiaColors
TunableList.description: EyeColor tags that describe valid eye colors for Sims that have heterochromia.

Tunable.name: MakeupBlushChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining blush when randomizing if random makeup should be set.

Tunable.name: MakeupChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly adding Makeup to a Sim at all when randomizing.

Tunable.name: MakeupEyeLinerChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining eye liner when randomizing if random makeup should be set.

Tunable.name: MakeupEyeShadowChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining eye shadow when randomizing if random makeup should be set.

Tunable.name: MakeupFacePaintChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining face paint make up if random makeup should be set.

Tunable.name: MakeupLipstickChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining lipstick when randomizing if random makeup should be set.

Tunable.name: OccultSkinDetailChance
Tunable.description: Chance of an occult skin detail body part being added.

Tunable.name: PurebredChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomization producing a purebred.

Tunable.name: PurebredModifierVariance
Tunable.description: Maximum amount by which modifiers for purebreds will vary from the values set in the breed preset.

Tunable.name: TattooChance
Tunable.description: Chance of randomly obtaining a tattoo when randomizing.

TunableTuple.name: SpecialTraits
TunableTuple.description: Traits with special meaning to the game engine.

Tunable.name: CustomGenderTrait
Tunable.description: trait identifying Sim as custom gender

TunableList.name: DisableCASEditTraits
TunableList.description: List of traits that disable direct manip in CAS

Tunable.name: ForceBreastlessTrait
Tunable.description: trait identifying Sim as custom gender

Tunable.name: ForceBreastsTrait
Tunable.description: trait identifying Sim as custom gender

Tunable.name: PregnantTrait
Tunable.description: trait identifying Sim as custom gender

TunableList.name: Species
TunableList.description: The species this tuning is specific to.

TunableTuple.name: WalkStyle
TunableTuple.description: Parameters to setup sim walkstyle for genetics and UI.

Tunable.name: DefaultWalkStyleTraitId
Tunable.description: Which achievements are unlocked when this achievement is completed.

Tunable.name: WalkStyleTraitId
Tunable.description: Walkstyle to not randomize.

Tunable.name: SpecialWalkStyleProbability
Tunable.description: Probability 0-1 of picking a special walk style versus the default one.
